name: Feast or Fathom
description:
How to play:

  • WASD to move, Shift+WASD to move diagonally
  • Bump into enemies to attack them 
  • Right-click skills to spend skill points to lock them in
  • Bump into the stairs twice to go to the kitchen
  • Click the recipes button in the lower right and click a recipe to start cooking 
  • Drag ingredients from your inventory and click COOK (you don't need all of a recipe's ingredients)
  • Drag meals to your health bar to ready them for eating
  • Double click the "stairs" icon in the lower right to eat your chosen meals and return to the dungeon
  • Travel to new floors by beating a floor's boss and returning to the kitchen
  • If/when you die, press R to restart the game

Tips:

  • Stats:
    • ATK is how much damage you do, affects some skills also
    • COOK affects the quality of your cooked meals
    • CARV affects the chance of enemies dropping corpses, and from getting ingredients from them
  • Check your recipe at the start and avoid fighting enemies whose ingredients you can't use yet
  • Going over a recipe's target number is just as bad as going under
  • Enemies are less likely to drop corpses when overkilled by a lot
  • Eventually your "customer level" will drop and you'll have to feed them to make them happy (drag meals to the upper right corner in the kitchen)
